ch.telegraphstudios.TSMenuBar

Class TSDroplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ch.telegraphstudios.TSMenuBar.TSDroplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileDrop.Listener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TSDroplet
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements FileDrop.Listener
    A TSDroplet is a component which lets the user drop an image on it.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
